meanings.definition: A common, often painful condition of the lower back.
meanings.sent1: After gardening all day, she developed lumbago in her lower back.
meanings.sent2: His lumbago made it difficult for him to bend down and tie his shoes.
meanings.sent3: The lumbago in his back seemed to have a mind of its own, acting up at the worst times.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world felt like lumbago pressing down on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The sharp, shooting pain of lumbago was a constant reminder of his limitations.

meanings.definition: Pain in the lumbar region of the back.
meanings.sent1: She winced as the lumbago in her lower back flared up again.
meanings.sent2: The athlete had to sit out the game due to severe lumbago in his lumbar region.
meanings.sent3: Despite the lumbago, he tried to dance at the party, causing some awkward moves.
meanings.sent4: The lumbago felt like a hot poker stabbing through his lower back.
meanings.sent5: The persistent lumbago made every step feel like a challenge.
